metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: HTML Study Plan
Introduction
The HTML study plan helps you teach your students HTML step-by-step.
content.html: The HTML study plan helps you teach your students HTML step-by-step.

content.text: Creating a study plan for HTML is easy.
content.html: Creating a study plan for HTML is easy.

content.text: You can use a pre-built study plan or customize it.
content.html: You can use a pre-built study plan or customize it.

content.text: Students have different skill levels. The study plans can be customized to ensure that everyone is challenged.
content.html: Students have different skill levels. The study plans can be customized to ensure that everyone is challenged.

content.text: Save time with pre-built teacher materials and study plans. Easily organize your class with a timeline from the introduction of HTML to the final exam.
content.html: Save time with pre-built teacher materials and study plans. Easily organize your class with a timeline from the introduction of HTML to the final exam.

content.text: W3Schools Academy
This study plan is a feature of W3Schools Academy.
content.html: This study plan is a feature of W3Schools Academy.

content.text: W3Schools Academy is a platform that has everything you need to teach coding, all in one place.
content.html: W3Schools Academy is a platform that has everything you need to teach coding, all in one place.

content.text: It offers you as a teacher a toolbox of features that helps you succeed with teaching in your classroom.
content.html: It offers you as a teacher a toolbox of features that helps you succeed with teaching in your classroom.

content.text: You need to have an active subscription to access the study plan feature. There are two different subscription tiers:

content.text: Teacher Materials
W3Schools has everything you need to teach HTML.
content.html: W3Schools has everything you need to teach HTML.

content.text: The HTML training materials is available for you to include and use in your study plan:
content.html: The HTML training materials is available for you to include and use in your study plan:

content.text: HTML Syllabus

With the HTML Syllabus, your students will start with the basics, like creating simple web pages, and move to more advanced topics, like adding images, links, and forms. Each chapter has examples, try-its, exercises, and quizzes to make learning easy, interactive and fun.
content.html: With the HTML Syllabus, your students will start with the basics, like creating simple web pages, and move to more advanced topics, like adding images, links, and forms. Each chapter has examples, try-its, exercises, and quizzes to make learning easy, interactive and fun.

content.text: Read more about HTML Syllabus .
content.html: Read more about HTML Syllabus.

content.text: Study Plan Overview
The study plan features are made to help teachers and students. They make learning easy, flexible, and fun. These features work for different types of classes, learning styles and student level.
content.html: The study plan features are made to help teachers and students. They make learning easy, flexible, and fun. These features work for different types of classes, learning styles and student level.

content.text: Learn More »
content.html: Learn More »

content.text: Sample Study Plan
You choose the timeline and pace of your study plans.
content.html: You choose the timeline and pace of your study plans.

content.text: Schools have different preferences.
content.html: Schools have different preferences.

content.text: Some would like more intensive pace, e.g. 4 weeks, others 12 or more weeks.
content.html: Some would like more intensive pace, e.g. 4 weeks, others 12 or more weeks.

content.text: It is completely up to you.
content.html: It is completely up to you.
